titles.title: To require the Secretary of State to establish passport issuance agencies within 50 miles of all major international border crossings.
To require the Secretary of State to establish passport issuance agencies within 50 miles of all major international border crossings.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
Directs the Secretary of State to establish passport issuance agencies within 50 miles of all major international border crossings.
Defines "major international border crossing" as an international border crossing that has an annual privately-owned passenger vehicle crossing volume of at least 5 million vehicles.
